authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: Secure your file uploads with Carcosa's flexible authentication system. Supports multiple auth providers and custom authentication logic.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Complete configuration guide for Carcosa. Customize every aspect of your file upload system.

examples/basic-upload.title: Basic Upload Example
examples/basic-upload.description: Complete working example of a file upload system with Carcosa. Copy, paste, and customize for your needs.

file-router/overview.title: File Router Overview
file-router/overview.description: The File Router is the heart of Carcosa - a type-safe, middleware-powered system for defining upload endpoints. Think of it as "tRPC for file uploads" with built-in validation, transformations, and real-time progress.

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Get Carcosa installed and running in your project. This guide covers all supported frameworks and deployment scenarios.

migration/from-uploadthing.title: Migrate from UploadThing
migration/from-uploadthing.description: Complete guide to migrating from UploadThing to Carcosa. Get all the features you love, plus enterprise capabilities UploadThing doesn't offer.

nextjs/components.title: Components Reference
nextjs/components.description: Complete guide to all Carcosa React components. Drop-in upload components with real-time progress, drag & drop, and TypeScript safety.

nextjs/setup.title: Next.js Setup
nextjs/setup.description: Complete guide to integrating Carcosa with your Next.js application. Works with both App Router and Pages Router.

quick-start.title: Quick Start
quick-start.description: Get up and running with Carcosa in less than 5 minutes! This guide will have you uploading files with real-time progress in no time.
